a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Real disposable household income by income decile, United
Data source: Incomes across the Distribution Database (Nolan, Thewissen, Roser (2016))
Note: Adjusted for household size, inflation and price differences between countries and expressed in 2011 international dollars. 1st decile is the cutoff
income that separate the poorest 10% from the richest 90% etc. The 5th decile is the median.
